pr_title: ci: upload to pypi on release

timeline.bodyText: Is this because it already exists from unzip ./manylinux-wheel/dist.zip? If so, we could add the additional context: # Don't unzip tar.gz because it already exists from ./manylinux-wheel/dist.zip.
timeline.author: mschwager
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -250,6 +250,31 @@ jobs:
         working-directory: /opt/python/cp36-cp36m/bin/
         run: ./semgrep -l python ../lib/python3.6/code.py -e '$X == $X'
 
+  upload-wheels:
+    runs-on: 'ubuntu-16.04'
+    needs: [test-wheels-manylinux, build-wheels-osx]
+    steps:
+      - name: Download Artifact
+        uses: actions/download-artifact@v1
+        with:
+          name: manylinux-wheel
+          path: manylinux-wheel
+      - name: Download Osx Artifact
+        uses: actions/download-artifact@v1
+        with:
+          name: osx-wheel
+          path: osx-wheel
+      - name: Unzip
+        run: unzip ./manylinux-wheel/dist.zip
+      - name: Unzip OSX Wheel
+        # Don't unzip tar.gz
